name: textView(_:shouldChangeTypingAttributes:toAttributes:)
desc: Sent when the typing attributes are changed.
declaration:
optional func textView(_ textView: NSTextView, 
shouldChangeTypingAttributes oldTypingAttributes: [String : Any] = [:], 
          toAttributes newTypingAttributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any] = [:]) -> [NSAttributedString.Key : Any]
